comments.author: Frank Wesemann
comments.body: this patch returns a valid xml Element.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
looks like it would be good to fix, as all the other querynodes return valid xml. 

will commit in a day or 2 if no one objects.

Thanks for reporting this Frank

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
Committed revision 1028767 to 3.0.x
Committed revision 1028768 to 2.9.x

description: MatchAllDocsQueryNode.toString() returns "<matchAllDocs field='*' term='*'>", which is inavlid XML should read "<matchAllDocs field='*' term='*' />.
